text: Added on-device google/flan-t5-small LLM support to MCP server (endpoints /llm/generate and LLM-backed /shell).
RCI (Reflexive Cognitive Interface) protocol added: interactive reflection architecture (EPM, BDL, MSR, ERL, MTA). Serves as cognitive layer between AGI and human.

google/flan-t5-small currently used in MCP is static; it does NOT learn from interactions unless we explicitly fine-tune or swap the model. Persistent learning is handled via separate JSONL memory store for context, not model weights.
